description: Finca Luna Nueva is an agro-ecological farm and tourism destination in Costa Rica, combining sustainable agriculture with ecotourism. Established in the early 2000s, it produces a diverse range of foods and spices, supplying around 70% of its restaurant's needs. The initiative emphasizes land stewardship and regenerative practices, aiming to educate visitors about sustainable farming. With a focus on community engagement and high employee retention, it seeks to balance economic viability with environmental responsibility.
name: Finca Luna Nueva
